summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a lawsuit involving Bank of America and its CEO, Kenneth Lewis. The email emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication and includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing legal matters related to Bank of America.
